title: Ep. 56: 'The Andy Greenwald Podcast' With Chef Eric Ripert
description:
Andy Greenwald talks to four-star chef Eric Ripert about his brilliant new memoir, '32 Yolks,' the importance of sauces, and what it's like getting sauced with Anthony Bourdain.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
